column4: Hey guys. Ubuntu software center (and other gui apps) aren't accepting my password. Any idea about what's going on?
nope. I can sudo in a terminal right after
Sinaptics? Another instance of software center already opened?
I got around it by doing sudo software-center
but that's a workaround, not a solution
that's odd, what version are you using?
I upgraded to the desktop from the server version though
maybe that has something to do with it
are you skilled on the server?
yeah. not bad. but there a few times when gnome is useful
do you know bu chance how to change the terminal background color from the bashrc?
no sorry. not something I particularly care about
